p: All experiments were performed in accordance with guidelines from the Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals of the NIH. Protocols were reviewed and approved by the IACUC at Yale University School of Medicine (Assurance number A3230-01). Every effort was made to reduce distress in animals. Animals were anesthetized with ketamine/xylazine for mosquito infection experiments, and sacrificed using CO 2 inhalation as recommended by the Yale IACUC.
